Text: Thank you.  Spin the Black Circle!

insinuendo, this sounds great but....

Do you hear the occasional pop?  Not from the vinyl.  Listen to track #5 "Black" at ~4:19, ~4:38 and ~5:00.

I heard it using the latest Winamp and Foobar.  I hope my soundcard isn't going to crap!

Thanks.

Yes rjordan21, 

there are some background pops, though I couldn't confirm for certain the source, but it's definitely not (only) your soundcard :)

BTW, I'm really enjoying the Possibilities and Face Value ups!
^^^^ Thanks.... glad you're enjoying the music.
I believe this release (the vinyl version) is the one where the post-prod' didn't crank up the volume compression and thus kill the dynamics, so thanks :)
Thank YOU for uploading in FLAC
Thanks a lot. Exactly what I was looking for!

tu insinuendo, top quality. PS: 2 little pops never hurt anyone. In the 70's we would wear the vinyl grooves thin before we had to repurchase the LP. By then, we heard 40 pops per side & still loved the jams. Same here.
